# keycloak-service-to-service-oidc-example


### 获取Token


```http request

POST http://192.168.201.188:8080/auth/realms/my-realm/protocol/openid-connect/token
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

client_id=service1&client_secret=fb339020-834b-406c-8fc8-8cd21df798d5&grant_type=password&username=sfeng&password=123456
```


### 访问应用

```http request
#GET http://localhost:10001/resource1
GET http://localhost:10001/resource2
#GET http://localhost:10001/public/jump/service2/resource2
#GET http://localhost:10001/public/jump/service3/resource2
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJ6N0ZnRkxWZ0FNNlJ4dkw3bTR4REVSd2s0bkdyY0xMX0pBMXctamdPRHBVIn0..cSMrZnQmcm5AbACbVBs1ItMDDrUj3YReQ22CPXMiOg5Ck3-B4oCSTtmUUs3s0exk0biWaAlip107-KMz39tjcAEssQovgXxCsgK0RYHtIAF927WGY8G_evPOBxQKQ8CMbibCaAXmERPi8vXW0egA8SHOZ5qOGaFZIeTMxrM0RpuTMmzR1ElHdEQz3pYZNMfqWuC06LUbrnV9iVVxfGybqPOQWJRxNnEVpsgPy5bg8tZoFIQDYBL1ajLpTxodMye2SRtfgLyjvIf66Nv26OUEsG2jgZ8xf6dLegokzcAt97bNZrv71Ni3b_6BSS_-pFx6UxLxs_1e1Mj4ChxLOmexEA
```
